attributes.action: Cancel the construction of HS2 and the Ox-express-way and give funds to NHS
attributes.additional_details: Recently during the covid 19 outbreak the its really clear that people can work from home travel is not needed as much and if we can continue to push for remote working the new infrastructure will not be needed. The projects will cost billions and this is valuable money that can go to the NHS and rebuild our economy.
attributes.background: Stop the build and construction of the HS2 and the oxford express way to free up the billions of pounds it will cost!!! Give this money to the NHS !!!

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/311642
